body: So basically I bought the gold rank about 4 ish hours ago I think. But never received my rank, should I use the support function of the website for this?
body_tagged: So basically I bought the gold rank about 4 ish hours ago I think. But never received my rank, should I use the support function of the website for this?
title: Shop purchase hasn't gone through yet?

replies.body: If you haven't received your rank within 48 hours, then yes.
